domain.name: Audiovisual Source Language Data
domain.desc: Audio or video recordings providing spoken/multimodal or signed language data for research purposes.

domain.name: Image Source Language Data
domain.desc: Digitized images of analogue sources of written language data for research purposes (e.g. facsimiles, scans of handwriting, photos of inscriptions).

domain.name: Textual Source Language Data
domain.desc: Written unstructured/plain text or originally structured text (e.g. HTML) without linguistic or other mark-up added for research purposes.

domain.name: Contextual Data
domain.desc: Images (photos or drawings) or documents relevant to the communicative event or text but not part of the source language data.

domain.name: Text Annotation
domain.desc: Annotations of textual sources/written text, with the original text included or as stand-off.

domain.name: Audiovisual Annotation
domain.desc: Annotations of audiovisual sources, usually including a basic rendering of the spoken content (transcription) and sometimes further annotation.

domain.name: Contextual Information
domain.desc: Structured information on the communicative event or text and its creators (i.e. participants or authors) relevant for analysis.

domain.name: Catalogue Metadata
domain.desc: Basic structured information for discoverability and general description, to be openly provided for harvesting.

domain.name: Metadata
domain.desc: Comprehensive structured information including descriptive, structural and administrative metadata. See the National Information Standards Organization primer on metadata for further hints.

domain.name: Documentation
domain.desc: Unstructured documentation of the resource and its parts such as corpus or annotation guidelines.

domain.name: Lexical Resource
domain.desc: Structured (item-based) resources for lexical and/or conceptual information on units of language (e.g. wordlists, lexicons, WordNets etc.)

domain.name: Tool Support
domain.desc: Tool-related formats required for specific functionality of the tool or reliable reuse of resources (e.g. tagsets, annotation schemes, vocabularies, language models, parameter files, and other specifications or settings)

domain.name: Statistical Data
domain.desc: Data from surveys and tests in numeric formats.

domain.name: Language Description
domain.desc: Structured or unstructured descriptions of linguistic varieties or phenomena, typological databases etc.

domain.name: Other
domain.desc: Any other function that cannot be included in an existing domain. The content of this domain will be periodically examined for potential patterns that may give rise to new domains.
